snippet.title: [BETA VIDEO] GWENT: THE WITCHER CARD GAME | A round of GWENT in 60 seconds
snippet.description:
The GWENT Closed Beta is available on Xbox One and PC! Haven’t registered yet? Sign up for the Closed Beta at playgwent.com and join in The Witcher universe’s favorite card game! 

In GWENT: The Witcher Card Game, gamers clash with their friends in fast-paced duels that combine bluffing, on-the-fly decision making and careful deck construction.
The game is played over a best-of-three series of rounds, as players unleash their hand by slinging spells and diverse units with special abilities and use clever tricks to deceive their opponents. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayGwent
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayGwent
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cdpred
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/cdprojektred
